what: R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
title: R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
text: Generate HTML file randomize prefilled answers Google Forms, generate codebook JSON output, import recode Google Forms survey CSV file. package website published .

title: R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
text: genstartpage Generate experiment start page (HTML). gensimplecodebook Generate (export) simplified codebook. read_gform Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information. bindquestions Combine multiple variables.

title: R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
Combine multiple variables — bindquestions
code: bindquestions(data, vnames, keep_var_label = FALSE, keep_val_labels = TRUE)

title: Combine multiple variables — bindquestions
text: data data.frame object vnames chracter vector variable names combine. keep_var_label Boolean indicate whether keep variable label (first varaible vnames) . keep_val_labels Boolean indicate whether keep value labels (first varaible vnames) .

title: Generate full-information codebook dataset — gencodebook
code: gencodebook(   survey_json,   DKtext = "\\u308f\\u304b\\u3089\\u306a\\u3044",   DKcode = 888,   NAtext = "\\u7b54\\u3048\\u305f\\u304f\\u306a\\u3044",   NAcode = 999,   text_randomize = NULL,   text_starttime = NULL )

title: Generate full-information codebook dataset — gencodebook
text: survey_json JSON survey file exported surveyexport.js. DKtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate "know" answers. DKcode Response code "know" answers. NAtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate refused answers. NAcode Response code refused answers. text_randomize Raw full text(s) question(s) used randomize experimental conditions. text_starttime Raw full text question used record starting time.

title: Generate (and export) simplified codebook — gensimplecodebook
code: gensimplecodebook(   survey_json,   DKtext = "\\u308f\\u304b\\u3089\\u306a\\u3044",   DKcode = 888,   NAtext = "\\u7b54\\u3048\\u305f\\u304f\\u306a\\u3044",   NAcode = 999,   OtherOptiontext = "\\u305d\\u306e\\u4ed6",   OtherOptioncode = 666,   includeTimeStamp = TRUE,   includeEmail = FALSE,   text_randomize = NULL,   text_starttime = NULL,   show_duration = TRUE,   textout = NULL,   csvout = NULL )

title: Generate (and export) simplified codebook — gensimplecodebook
text: survey_json JSON survey file exported surveyexport.js. DKtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate "know" answers. DKcode Response code "know" answers. NAtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate refused answers. NAcode Response code refused answers. OtherOptiontext Texts codebook indicate "" answers. OtherOptioncode Response code "" answers. includeTimeStamp Boolean indicate whether include system-generated timestamp variable codebook . includeEmail Boolean indicate whether include system-generated email variable codebook . text_randomize Raw full text(s) question(s) used randomize experimental conditions. text_starttime Raw full text question used record starting time. show_duration Boolean indicate whether include duration variable codebook (text_starttime available). textout Name path output html file saved. csvout Name path output csv file saved.

title: Generate experiment start page (HTML) — genstartpage
code: genstartpage(survey_json, text_randomize, text_starttime = NULL, file = NULL)

title: Generate experiment start page (HTML) — genstartpage
text: survey_json JSON survey file exported surveyexport.js. text_randomize Raw full text(s) question(s) used randomize experimental conditions. text_starttime Raw full text question used record starting time. file Name path output html file saved.

what: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information — read_gform
title: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information — read_gform
text: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information

title: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information — read_gform
code: read_gform(   survey_csv,   survey_json,   DKtext = "\\u308f\\u304b\\u3089\\u306a\\u3044",   DKcode = 888,   NAtext = "\\u7b54\\u3048\\u305f\\u304f\\u306a\\u3044",   NAcode = 999,   OtherOptiontext = "\\u305d\\u306e\\u4ed6",   OtherOptioncode = 666,   text_randomize = NULL,   text_starttime = NULL,   includeTimeStamp = TRUE,   show_duration = TRUE,   includeEmail = FALSE,   ... )

title: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information — read_gform
text: survey_csv CSV survey response file exported using Google Sheets output. survey_json JSON survey file exported surveyexport.js. DKtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate "know" answers. DKcode Response code "know" answers. NAtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate refused answers. NAcode Response code refused answers. OtherOptiontext Texts codebook indicate "" answers. OtherOptioncode Response code "" answers. text_randomize Raw full text(s) question(s) used randomize experimental conditions. text_starttime Raw full text question used record starting time. includeTimeStamp Boolean indicate whether include system-generated timestamp variable codebook . show_duration Boolean indicate whether include duration variable codebook (text_starttime available). includeEmail Boolean indicate whether include system-generated email variable codebook . ... Optional argumens passed read.csv() function.
